All Classes

Class Description
AccountExistsException
Exception for security and creation of account handling
AccountHandler
Service class that handles the user account
AccountRecoveryException
Exception for security and execution of account recovery
ApplicationUser
Implementation of the user details
ApplicationUserRole
All the different roles a user can have as enums
ApplicationUserService
Implementation of the UserDetailsService
AuthController
Controller class for Autentication
AuthService
Service that handles the authentication
BaseEntity
Our "Bases" class to generate Ids, created, and updated timestamps.
Car
Entity of Car object
CarNotFoundException
Exception for DB and frontend Searches of specific cars
CarRepository
Repository for Car
CurrentDateHandler
Workaround to make unittest for method in UserService class due Cron (setTireHasChanged)
DataSourceConfiguration
Configures data source
DuplicateCarException
Exception for DB and frontend for adding cars of duplicated nature in one account
EmailService
Class dedicated to handling email functionality with and around sendGrid
ExpiredTokenException
Exception for security and token handling with email conformation and account recovery
InvalidTokenException
Exception for security and token handling with email conformation and account recovery
PasswordConfiguration
Configuration class for password bean
PasswordConstraintValidator
Constraint Validator for Password
PasswordMisMatchException
Exception for security and creation of account handling
PasswordRequestData
POJO with lombok for changing password
PaymentException
Exception for security and premium account handling and/or upgrading
ProjectApplication  
ResponseObject
A simple class to send Response messages back in other methods
SecurityConfiguration
Configuration for spring security
TireHasChangedTimePeriodException
Exception for denying the change of tireHasChanged bool during certain time periods
TireNotification
Tirenotification is used to send email notifications to users
TireNotificationRepository
Repository for TireNotification
Token
Token class to generate verification/recovery tokens for users.
TokenRepository
Repository for Token
TokenService
Service class that handles token verification.
TokenType
Enum for set Tokentype
User
Entity class that handles User
UserController
USercontroller contains all API endpoints connected to a user and its actions on the application.
UserDto
User DTO Class that handles user data.
UserRepository
Repository for User
UserService
Service class that handles User data and account
ValidPassword  
WebConfiguration
Defines callback methods to customize the Java-based configuration for Spring MVC enabled via @EnableWebMvc.
